segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 46
segments.en: Linked Discourses 46

segments.pli: 1. Pabbatavagga
segments.en: 1. Mountains

segments.pli: 2. Kāyasutta
segments.en: 2. The Body

segments.pli: Sāvatthinidānaṃ.
segments.en: At Sāvatthī.

segments.pli: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
segments.en: “Mendicants, this body is sustained by food. It depends on food to continue, and without food it doesn’t continue.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, pañca nīvaraṇā āhāraṭṭhitikā, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhanti, anāhārā no tiṭṭhanti.
segments.en: In the same way, the five hindrances are sustained by fuel. They depend on fuel to continue, and without fuel they don’t continue.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ.
segments.en: There is the feature of beauty.

segments.pli: Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent improper attention to that

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
segments.en: fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, paṭighanimittaṃ.
segments.en: There is the feature of harshness.

segments.pli: Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent improper attention to that

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
segments.en: fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ.
segments.en: There is discontent, sloth, yawning, sleepiness after eating, and mental sluggishness.

segments.pli: Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent improper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
segments.en: fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso avūpasamo.
segments.en: There is the unsettled mind.

segments.pli: Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent improper attention to that

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
segments.en: fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā dhammā.
segments.en: There are things that are grounds for doubt.

segments.pli: Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent improper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
segments.en: fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
segments.en: This body is sustained by food. It depends on food to continue, and without food it doesn’t continue.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca nīvaraṇā āhāraṭṭhitikā, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhanti, anāhārā no tiṭṭhanti.
segments.en: In the same way, the five hindrances are sustained by fuel. They depend on fuel to continue, and without fuel they don’t continue.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
segments.en: This body is sustained by food. It depends on food to continue, and without food it doesn’t continue.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā āhāraṭṭhitikā, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhanti, anāhārā no tiṭṭhanti.
segments.en: In the same way, the seven awakening factors are sustained by fuel. They depend on fuel to continue, and without fuel they don’t continue.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā.
segments.en: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of mindfulness.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā, sāvajjānavajjā dhammā, hīnapaṇītā dhammā, kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā.
segments.en: There are qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of energy, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu.
segments.en: There are the elements of initiative, persistence, and exertion.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of energy, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of rapture, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā.
segments.en: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of rapture.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of rapture, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of tranquility, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, kāyapassaddhi, cittapassaddhi.
segments.en: There is tranquility of the body and of the mind.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to that

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of tranquility, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of immersion, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimittaṃ abyagganimittaṃ.
segments.en: There are things that are the foundation of serenity and freedom from distraction.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of immersion, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā?
segments.en: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of equanimity, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā.
segments.en: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of equanimity.

segments.pli: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro—
segments.en: Frequent proper attention to them

segments.pli: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya pāripūriyā.
segments.en: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of equanimity, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
segments.en: This body is sustained by food. It depends on food to continue, and without food it doesn’t continue.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjhaṅgā āhāraṭṭhitikā, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhanti, anāhārā no tiṭṭhantī”ti.
segments.en: In the same way, the seven awakening factors are sustained by fuel. They depend on fuel to continue, and without fuel they don’t continue.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Just as the body depends on food, the awakening factors depend on nutriment. The Buddha gives specific conditions for each of the factors.
